text:
@narendramodi So Janta Curfew was a big success but State gov. lockdown is much failure , I recommend to impose Janta curfew again for 2-3 days . 
Congratulation to Made-In-India campaigners as India made cheapest , Compatible , Faster and maybe the best Covid-19 test kit which can test 100s.
